content: 🎙️ Episode 11 of Tech Talk with Zoka is LIVE! 👇👇👇Watch now: https://lnkd.in/dMXsPQar🚀 Discover the Future of Intelligent Automation with Agentic AI!In this exclusive episode, I sit down with Danyal S. — AI Advisor, Certified Scrum Master, and ex-PwC expert — to dive into one of the most exciting shifts in tech: Agentic AI.🤖 What you'll learn in this episode: 🔹 What is Agentic AI? 🔹 How AI Agents are transforming decision-making & business operations 🔹 The rise of AI-powered autonomy 🔹 Opportunities and risks in this evolving field💡 Whether you're a tech leader, AI builder, or curious learner — this episode will reshape how you think about the next generation of AI.🎯 Real stories. Real insight. Real impact. 🎥 Tune in now: https://lnkd.in/dMXsPQarhashtag#TechTalkWithZoka hashtag#AgenticAI hashtag#AIagents hashtag#Automation hashtag#DigitalTransformation hashtag#FutureOfAI hashtag#AIpodcast
